short_summary: Bid for 20 cylinders and regulators for the Department of National Defence. The deadline for bids is November 7th, 2022 2:00 PM EST.
description: The Department of National Defence requires 20 cylinders and regulators for oxygen. The units must be delivered to CFSD Montreal by December 15th, 2022.
full_summary:
**Cylinder and Regulator**

**Solicitation Invitation Number**: W8485-237293/A

**Tender Description**
The Department of National Defence invites bids for the acquisition of Oxygen Equipment, Aircraft (GSIN: N1660E, NSN: 21-811-0947). The tender is scheduled to close on 2022-11-07T14:00:00.

**Scope of Work**
The Department of National Defence is seeking the following item:

*   Item 1: Cylinder and Regulator, Oxygen (Part No.: 9000A4, NCAGE: 35186)
	+ Quantity: 20 units
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Delivery to: CFSD Montreal by December 15th, 2022

**Important Notice**
Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product are required to indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.

**Vendor Information**
The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Bidders are encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service instead of the other methods of bid delivery available.

**Contracting Entity**
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2, Canada

**Contact Information**
Danny Lebel, Procurement Officer
Phone: Not Available
Email: <dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca>
**Attachments**
Bid Solicitation Document (English): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/04/ac8a6c10e83bedbef8c04cebdde51e3c/w8485-237293a_bid_solicitation_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/04/ac8a6c10e83bedbef8c04cebdde51e3c/w8485-237293a_bid_solicitation_en.pdf)
Bid Solicitation Document (French): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/04/aea77fa3919de02ea34fd264c9e3b544/w8485-237293a_bid_solicitation_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/04/aea77
